founders.name: Anil Meena, Founder
founders.description:
I find myself wondering about the 'whys' and the 'whats' often. That's when I found that my strength and passion lie in journeying with an idea to a finished product and see it flourish.

I have the objective of creating and managing excellent products that are not only the answers to all questions customers pose but also a delight to have in their lives.

# The Only All-in-one, White labeled, Developer friendly community Platform

# Improve retention, growth and advocacy with the all-in-one community engagement platform
## Designed for all use cases
From open discussion to gated content. Create different groups for all kind of use cases, like coaching, mentoring, courses, forums, live classes, etc.
Replaces
Slack OR Discord OR Forum
## Your Community. Your Branding.
Design your community to match your branding. Make it feel like your own product with complete customization & integration, including mobile app
Avoids
Custom development
# üî¥ Live Sessions
![Live video with recording within your community platform.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62a638fa42b260e235ae4538_Video%20calling.png)
## Immersive Experience
Conduct Live sessions or webinars, and get the best audio and video quality
# Host Event with Live QnA
Invite hosts, moderators & get the best live experience for your community
# Share your live recordings
Share or upload recording on Youtube, Facebook, Vimeo, or any other platform
# The Whole Package
Right tools to strengthen your community
## SEO Optimised Content
Rank higher in google search result with SEO optimized content
## Gamification
Engage community with karma points, badges, milestones, etc.
## Dedicated Servers
Scale as you grow with a dedicated server for community of any size
## Embed Custom Pages
Add your website, e-commerce page, or anything with a simple script
## Bunch of Integration
Plug in with other tools which you are already using and bring the best of both the world
## Newsletter
Won't it be great if you could just send a newsletter from your community, well its almost here
"Pensil is super. We were looking to integrate with Circle based out of US but this made us change the game plan."
![Karan from Tyke](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d158e918fc8026bd23c_image%20226.png)
Karan Mehra
CEO at TykeInvest
# Mobile app for your community
Get a complete, custom branded app for your community & give your community the experience they deserve.
[Get Mobile App](https://pensil.in/</mobile-app>)
# Made For Developers, By Developers
From easy integrations to deploying your own front end, we have everything you need to get started. Integrate with our SDKs. Some SDKs may require some additional configuration through your Dev Portal.
[Explore Docs![""](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62a6421f770675bd71dc248a_yellow%20arrow.png)](https://pensil.in/<https:/docs.pensil.in/>)
![Integrate with your product with SDK and APIs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/627fca37c50d7a1edf696c56_Screenshot%202022-05-14%20at%208.49.07%20PM.png)
## What our users have been saying
"We use the Pensil platform to interlink all our rural libraries and also to connect city volunteers with students in villages in Rural Lucknow"
![Anurag](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d1511a53c226bd91da8_image%20224.png)
**Anurag Trivedi**
Shaan Foundation
"We are building a community for freelancers in the Middle East. Pensil provides a nice little place for us to come together."
![User](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d168b917a008c4ec66d_image%20230.png)
**Abed Mousley**
Tapflow.com
"I love the platform, ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è. All our students use Pensil for internal communication and academics.It has been awesome working with the Pensil team".
![Hetal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d15a2ee0939b0a92408_image%20223.png)
**Hetal Mundra**
Somaiya Design School
"Love the slick minimalism and easy to use design on the community platform. It has everything one will need."
![User](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d168b917a83034ec66c_image%20229.png)
**Jon Henson Griƒç**
CyptoTap
"I run UPSC cohorts on Pensil. It is different from other applications - it is more fun, connects everyone and lets us study together."
![Abhijeet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d15ace37f13ebb794c8_image%20225.png)
**Abhijeet Yadav**
Perlims Focus Group
"I like what i see. Pensil has neat sections for different topics and i can make them on my own. Plus in-built video tool is very useful"
![Sheri](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d1647f2426eec2e4522_image%20227.png)
**Sheri Staffiery**
theheartway.org

![Karan from Tyke](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d158e918fc8026bd23c_image%20226.png)
**Karan Mehra**
Tyke Invest
"I love Pensil, This is great. Good to see world class product coming from India. Keep growing"
![Abed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615a8096dd69ecb979d5ea68/62751d16d15f28ed79c0beaf_image%20228.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pensil**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, Pensil is an innovative SaaS company based in Gurugram, India. With a small team of four, they are dedicated to reshaping community engagement in the gaming sector through their White Label Community Platform SDKs and APIs. Their mission? To empower organizations‚Äîfrom colleges and universities to startups and brands‚Äîwith an all-in-one solution that enhances interactions and fosters community.

**What is Pensil?**

Pensil positions itself as a developer-friendly community platform that integrates seamlessly into existing ecosystems. Whether you're looking to create cohort-based courses, establish brand communities, or connect mentors with their mentees, Pensil provides the tools to do it all. Their platform supports a wide range of functions‚Äîfrom live video sessions to gamified experiences‚Äîoffering customization that allows communities to reflect their unique branding without the hassle of custom development.

**Key Features:**

- **Versatile Use Cases:** Pensil serves various applications, including colleges, cohort-based courses, brand communities, and mentoring relationships.
- **Customization and Branding:** Users can tailor their community space to match their identity, making it feel like their own product.
- **Integrated Live Features:** Engage your community with live sessions, webinars, and high-quality recordings that can be shared across multiple platforms.
- **Community Building Tools:** From gamification elements like badges and points to SEO-optimized content, Pensil equips users with the right tools for retention and growth.

**Current Offerings:**

- **Mobile Application:** Get a fully branded mobile app for your community.
- **Developer Support:** Designed by developers for developers, their SDKs and APIs simplify the integration process with existing products.
- **Community Management Resources:** Access a plethora of resources including blog articles and integration guides.

**Why Choose Pensil?**

Pensil is emerging as a front-runner in the community-building space, and early feedback from users highlights its effectiveness:
- Karan Mehra, CEO of TykeInvest, stated, "Pensil is super. We were looking to integrate with Circle based out of the US but this made us change the game plan."
- Users from various sectors praise its user-friendly design and robust features.

In a digital landscape increasingly reliant on community engagement, Pensil stands out as a strategic partner for those looking to foster deeper connections among their users. With all the right tools neatly packaged in one platform, they‚Äôre set on making community-building as effortless as possible.

For more information, check out their website: [Pensil](https://pensil.in).
